speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0123/2007 ) by Kyösti Virrankoski, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the Commission's annual policy strategy for the 2008 budget procedure, Section III – Commission ( 2007/2017(BUD) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0123/2007 ) by Kyösti Virrankoski, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the Commission's annual policy strategy for the 2008 budget procedure, Section III – Commission ( 2007/2017(BUD) ).
